Metadata.SourceDocument: Microsoft Security Baseline - MSFT Windows Server 2022 - Domain Controller
Metadata.Title: Microsoft Security Baseline - MSFT Windows Server 2022 - Domain Controller - DSC Module Mappings

Mappings.Title: Prevent enabling lock screen slide show
Configure SMB v1 client driver - Configure MrxSmb10 driver
Enable Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP)
Limits print driver installation to Administrators
NetBT NodeType configuration - Configure NetBT NodeType
MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting IPv6) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing) - DisableIPSourceRoutingIPv6
Mappings.RecommendedValue: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled

Mappings.Title: MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing) - DisableIPSourceRouting
Mappings.RecommendedValue: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled

Mappings.Title: MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes
MSS: (NoNameReleaseOnDemand) Allow the computer to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers
Windows Defender Firewall: Protect all network connections
Remote host allows delegation of non-exportable credentials
Boot-Start Driver Initialization Policy - Choose the boot-start drivers that can be initialized
Mappings.RecommendedValue: Good, unknown and bad but critical

Mappings.Title: Configure registry policy processing - Do not apply during periodic background processing
Configure registry policy processing - Process even if the Group Policy objects have not changed
Enumeration policy for external devices incompatible with Kernel DMA Protection - Enumeration policy
Set the default behavior for AutoRun - Default AutoRun Behavior
Mappings.RecommendedValue: Do not execute any autorun commands

Mappings.Title: Turn off Autoplay - Turn off Autoplay on
Specify the maximum log file size (KB)
Specify the maximum log file size (KB)
Specify the maximum log file size (KB)
Do not allow passwords to be saved
Always prompt for password upon connection
Set client connection encryption level - Encryption Level
Set client connection encryption level - Choose the encryption level from the drop-down list.
Configure Windows Defender SmartScreen - Pick one of the following settings
Allow Windows Ink Workspace - Choose one of the following actions
Sign-in and lock last interactive user automatically after a restart
Turn on PowerShell Script Block Logging - Log script block invocation start / stop events:
Disallow WinRM from storing RunAs credentials
